name: Backpacked
description:
A game made for the 48h Quarantine Game Jam! Theme was Pack so I decided to give the player a backpack that will grow larger as he collects more stuff. Making it harder to dodge bullets.

You have to collect candy and be fast to get good score. The catch is the more candy you collect the bigger you are and so it is easier to hit you. Find a balance between being fast, collecting candy and not making the game too hard for yourself.

Any feedback is very much appreciated :)
